items.sentence: Tom said he thought there was no life on Mars.
Tom wants his son to learn how to read French.
I didn't tell Tom what we were planning to do.
Tom opened the bathroom door without knocking.
Tom used dry moss as tinder to start the fire.
Tom lived on the same small farm all his life.
Tom hasn't been here in the last three months.
Tom needs to come to grips with what happened.
Tom needs to stop trying to help Mary so much.
Tom needs to know Mary isn't going to do that.
It took some effort for Tom to finish the job.
Tom got down on his knees and started praying.
I don't believe that you didn't see Tom there.
As a matter of fact, I know nothing about Tom.
The pictures Tom paints look like photographs.
What kind of food do you eat on Christmas Day?
Somebody told me that Tom had moved to Boston.
Tom went to the supermarket to buy a cake mix.
Tom's concert was much better than I expected.
Where is the most beautiful place you've been?
